WORDS OF WISDOM.answer: A wise man, or the Salvia officinalis in his garden

WORDS OF WISDOM.question: discreet
WORDS OF WISDOM.answer: "Dis" word means careful to keep things confidential

WORDS OF WISDOM.question: shrewd
WORDS OF WISDOM.answer: There's a little mammalian insectivore in this word meaning "sharp in judgment"

WORDS OF WISDOM.question: tact
WORDS OF WISDOM.answer: From Latin for "touch", it's sensitivity & skill in dealing with others

WORDS OF WISDOM.question: rational
WORDS OF WISDOM.answer: In math this adjective describes a number expressible as a quotient of 2 integers

MEDICAL \"E\"s.question: the eardrum
MEDICAL \"E\"s.answer: Severe otitis media can lead to a perforation of this membrane

MEDICAL \"E\"s.question: emphysema
MEDICAL \"E\"s.answer: (Sarah of the Clue Crew shows lungs and alveoli on the monitor.) The exchange of carbon dioxide for oxygen takes place in tiny air sacs in the lungs called alveoli; smoking can make breathing difficult by causing the destruction of alveoli in this chronic lung disease

MEDICAL \"E\"s.question: Ebola
MEDICAL \"E\"s.answer: The 2014-15 outbreak of this deadly virus was larger than all previous ones combined

MEDICAL \"E\"s.question: endorphins
MEDICAL \"E\"s.answer: A runner's high is produced by the release of these hormones, nature's opiates

MEDICAL \"E\"s.question: ectopic
MEDICAL \"E\"s.answer: It's the word for a pregnancy that occurs outside the uterus

PLAN.question: Mexico
PLAN.answer: The 1821 Plan de Iguala, named for a city in Guerrero, led to this country's independence from Spain

PLAN.question: Panama
PLAN.answer: It completes the palindrome "A man, a plan, a canal--"

PLAN.question: Asia
PLAN.answer: Named for the city where it began, the Colombo plan was created in 1950 to provide aid to the south of this continent

PLAN.question: a Five-Year Plan
PLAN.answer: Comrade, the first of these was begun in 1928 & lasted until 1932

PLAN.question: World War I
PLAN.answer: The Schlieffen Plan, named for a field marshal who died the year before, was used by Germany at the start of this war

FROM OUTER SPACE.question: a golf ball
FROM OUTER SPACE.answer: On TV in 1971 Alan Shepard called one of these a "little white pellet that's familiar to millions of Americans"

FROM OUTER SPACE.question: Clinton
FROM OUTER SPACE.answer: The only U.S. prez to be present at a shuttle launch, he watched John Glenn's return to space after 36 years

FROM OUTER SPACE.question: (absentee) ballots
FROM OUTER SPACE.answer: For Nov. 4, 2008 a county clerk in Texas beamed these traditionally paper items to the ISS; later they were beamed back

FROM OUTER SPACE.question: the Columbia
FROM OUTER SPACE.answer: Hills on Mars are named in memory of people who perished Feb. 1, 2003 on this craft

& OTHER ODD FILMS.question: Elvis
& OTHER ODD FILMS.answer: In "Bubba Ho-Tep" Bruce Campbell plays this "king of rock & roll" who sets off to nab a mummy with a guy who thinks he's JFK

& OTHER ODD FILMS.question: a zombie
& OTHER ODD FILMS.answer: Billy Connolly isn't a dog in "Fido", but rather one of these undead minions

& OTHER ODD FILMS.question: a lobster
& OTHER ODD FILMS.answer: In a recent movie Colin Farrell is given 45 days to find love or he's going to be turned into this title animal

& OTHER ODD FILMS.question: Donnie Darko
& OTHER ODD FILMS.answer: As the title character of this film, Jake Gyllenhaal is plagued by visions of a 6-foot rabbit named Frank

& OTHER ODD FILMS.question: Eraserhead
& OTHER ODD FILMS.answer: A favorite of Kubrick's was this 1977 black-&-white David Lynch horror film about a man with an unusual child

21st CENTURY THOUGHT.question: the black swan
21st CENTURY THOUGHT.answer: The title subject of a 2007 bestseller, it was discovered in Australia where today it's a state emblem
